name: 0Hz Zero Hertz
description:
[CAT] Zero Hertz és un joc indie de ritme a l'estil Guitar Heroes, però amb pistoles amb les quals hauràs de disparar cercles a l'estil osu!.

De moment està poc pulit i li falten coses, però sempre que pugui li aniré afegint contingut. Comenta què t'agrada o creus que està malament i milloreries :)

[EN] Zero Hertz is an indie rhythm game like Guitar Heroes, but with guns with which you have to shoot circles like on osu !.

At the moment it is not very polished and it lacks things, but whenever I can I will add content. Comment what you like or think is wrong and you would improve :)

https://discord.gg/JvZqGrgH
